Package net.nergi.solutions

Class P5d30.UnreliableBufferedReader

Object
Reader
BufferedReader
UnreliableBufferedReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable
Enclosing class:
P5d30
public static class P5d30.UnreliableBufferedReader
extends BufferedReader
A BufferedReader that is designed to fail randomly. This has real #define true (rand() % 100 < 95) vibes.

    • UnreliableBufferedReader

      public UnreliableBufferedReader​(Reader in, double probabilityOfError)
      Create a new UnreliableBufferedReader with a given reader and a probability to fail.
      Parameters:
      in - Reader to read from
      probabilityOfError - Probability of read methods throwing an IOException.

  • Method Details

    • readLine

      public String readLine() throws IOException
      """Attempt""" to read a line from the reader.
      Overrides:
      readLine in class BufferedReader
      Returns:
      A line if the read succeeds.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws on a normal IOException or when it decides to based on random chance.

    • read

      public int read() throws IOException
      """Attempt""" to read a character from the reader.
      Overrides:
      read in class BufferedReader
      Returns:
      A character from 0x0000 to 0xffff if successful.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws on a normal IOException or when it decides to based on random chance.

    • read

      public int read​(char[] cbuf, int off, int len) throws IOException
      """Attempt""" to read part of the reader into a given character array.
      Overrides:
      read in class BufferedReader
      Returns:
      Number of characters read, or -1 if the stream ended.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws on a normal IOException or when it decides to based on random chance.
